item.title: 'Find common ground', tourists in Washington tell lawmakers amid shutdown
item.description: Several museums and landmarks, including the US Capitol and Washington Monument, have closed to visitors.

item.title: Robert Mugabe's son appears in court on drug charge
item.description: Police allege they found marijuana on him during a traffic stop and are investigating a "syndicate linked to him".

item.title: Israel intercepts Gaza flotilla and detains activists including Greta Thunberg
item.description: South Africa and Turkey have criticised the incident in international waters. Israel says those on board are safe.

item.title: Captain of tanker linked to Russian 'shadow fleet' charged in France
item.description: The Chinese national faces a count of refusing to follow naval instructions while piloting the vessel.

item.title: Four ill with sepsis after food poisoning outbreak at Stockholm restaurant
item.description: The rare and potentially life-threatening complication comes after the people dined at a luxury eatery.
